snippet.title: A Total War Saga: TROY - MYTHOS Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
The battle for Troy cannot be waged by man alone. A winged behemoth, a slithering serpent with many heads and a beast prowling the abyss — track them, harness them and turn the tide of war in the MYTHOS DLC. 

Wishlist MYTHOS now, out on 2 September: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1553061/A_Total_War_Saga_TROY__Mythos/?utm_source=Mythos&utm_medium=Video_YouTube&utm_campaign=Launch&utm_content=Announce_Trailer
Pre-order the Heroic Edition of TROY now on our official store: https://store.troy.totalwar.com/?utm_source=Mythos&utm_medium=Video_YouTube&utm_campaign=Launch&utm_content=Announce_Trailer
 
Any questions? Check out our FAQ articles.
MYTHOS: https://www.totalwar.com/blog/total-war-troy-mythos-release-date-faq/
TROY on Steam: https://www.totalwar.com/blog/total-war-troy-steam-release-date-faq/

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

#TotalWar #TROY #TotalWarTroy #MYTHOS

Follow us on social media:
➤ https://discord.gg/totalwar
➤ http://www.facebook.com/totalwar
➤ http://www.twitter.com/totalwar
➤ http://www.instagram.com/totalwarofficial
➤ http://www.twitch.tv/totalwar

Video type: Cinematic
What does this mean? Full info here: ➤ http://wiki.totalwar.com/w/About_our_trailers
